title: A new balade of the worthy seruice of late doen by Maister Strangwige in Fraunce, and of his death
author: Birch, William, fl. 1562-1571.
publisher: By Alexander Lacy for William Owen, and are to be sold at the little shop at the north dore of Poules,
notes: A song - "England hath lost a soldiour of late".
Reproductions of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
Appears at reel 175 and at reel 875 (same copy filmed twice).
